item.title: A certain newly created wallet has accumulated 500 BTC over the past two weeks, totaling $58.3 million in value
item.description: On July 7th, based on the monitoring of OnchainLens, during the past two weeks, a newly established wallet has accumulated 500 BTC from a cryptocurrency exchange (CEX), with a value of $58.3 million.Address: 14yyRRiEMJ5q5LmDCH4Nf6Emx7UKhoRfxR

item.title: The three major U.S. stock indexes extended their gains, with the Nasdaq rising over 1%.
item.description: On August 7th, based on the market data from RockFlow, the three major U.S. stock indexes witnessed an extension of their gains. The Nasdaq increased by more than 1%, the S&P 500 rose by 0.76%, and the Dow went up by 0.32%.

item.title: MYX Finance Issues Official Clarification on 3% 'Binance Wallet Airdrop' Distribution
item.description: August 7th: MYX Finance has issued an official clarification regarding the distribution of a 3% "Binance Wallet Airdrop." MYX witnessed a total monthly unlock of 3.9% on August 6th. MYX Finance stated that this distribution is distinct and not readily representable in a traditional token unlock schedule. The specific details are as follows:The full 3% of the tokens will be set aside for MYX and Binance Wallet's joint community reward program;These tokens will be specifically designated for future community activities and will not be immediately sold on the open market;This batch of tokens was unlocked on August 5th with 1.5%, and the remaining 1.5% will be unlocked on November 6, 2025. After each unlock, Binance Wallet will have the autonomy to determine how to deploy these tokens in community activities. Prior to officially announcing such activities, the unlocked tokens will be held in a designated reserve wallet and will not enter circulation.

item.title: LookOnChain: Coinbase to List DYDX
item.description: On August 6th, Coinbase will list DYDX. Provided that liquidity conditions are fulfilled, trading will commence on August 7, 2025, at 9:00 AM Pacific Time or at a later time.

item.title: CBOE Files Application Seeking Approval for VanEck Ethereum ETF with Staking
item.description: On August 6th, the Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE)'s Cboe BZX submitted a 19b-4 filing to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. It requested approval for VanEck's Ethereum ETF to utilize a trusted staking provider to stake ETH so as to receive staking rewards as income.

item.title: Hyperlane announces that Warp Routes 2.0 has been launched on the Ethereum network
item.description: On August 6th, the cross-chain interoperability protocol Hyperlane announced that Warp Routes 2.0 has been launched on the Ethereum network. This enables users to enjoy the instant bridging of native tokens with zero slippage. Additionally, it provides developers with a liquidity layer tool for building liquidity for any cross-chain token.

item.title: Trump: Proud to Donate President's Salary, First Installment Used for White House Renovation
item.description: On August 6th, Trump put up a post on Truth Social and said: I take pride in being the only president (maybe except for the late and great President Washington) to donate my salary. My first paycheck was given to the White House Historical Association for the urgently needed renovation of this beautiful people's residence. The White House is experiencing extensive improvements and beautification at a scale that has not been witnessed since its initial construction. Let's Make America Great Again!

item.title: Apple Stock Surges Over 5.8%, Marking Highest Gain Since May 12
item.description: On August 6th, based on the market data from RockFlow (with the link https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats and targeted at _blank), Apple's stock witnessed an intraday surge of over 5.8%, reaching its highest gain since May 12th. Apple is scheduled to launch a new U.S. manufacturing plan and is set to increase its U.S. investment commitment by $100 billion. President Trump is anticipated to make a statement regarding this on this day.

item.title: 「Insider Trader」 Stops Out BTC Short, Gives Back $26M Profit and Loses $2M Principal
item.description: On August 6th, as per EmberCN's monitoring, the "Insider Trader" @qwatio liquidated half of their BTC short position on Hyperliquid 20 minutes ago. After having returned $26 million in profit, their initial capital has endured a loss of $2 million, with only $1 million remaining.Currently, @qwatio still maintains a $62.5 million BTC short position with a liquidation price set at $115,368.

item.title: Tesla's stock surged over 3.3% intraday, with the new version of FSD software expected to be released by the end of next month
item.description: On August 6th, based on the market data from RockFlow, Tesla (TSLA.O) saw an intraday surge of more than 3.3%. The trading volume exceeded 10 billion US dollars. Its new FSD model is expected to be released by the end of next month.
